Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage.api.autocrafting.task

Interface ICraftingTaskFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
CraftingTaskFactory
public interface ICraftingTaskFactory
A factory that creates a crafting task. Register this factory in the ICraftingTaskRegistry.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ICalculationResult
    create(INetwork network, ICraftingRequestInfo requested, int quantity, ICraftingPattern pattern)
    Returns a crafting task for a given pattern.
    ICraftingTask
    createFromNbt(INetwork network, net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag tag)
    Returns a crafting task for a given NBT tag.
